page.title: 02Important Nearby Places
page.content: White horse hill is one part of the Down lands hills. A nearby hill is called Dragon hill legends say that Saint George killed a dragon and the hill is where the dragon was buried. White horse hill has a chalk horse on it but you must not walk on the horse because you might destroy the edge. There are Roman burials on white horse hill. Wayland Smithy stands in a small wood one mile away from a main road.There is a tale that if you tie your horse to the lintel and leave some money,your horse will be shod next morning. Wayland Smithy has 4 stones in front of the Tomb where bodies would have been buried Wayland Smithy is open to the public. Wayland Smithy was built about 4,700 years ago .Axes ,pottery ,antler picks and flints were found in the tomb.
